title: Romancing the Stars
speaker: Michael Karkar
blurb: This Valentine’s Day, find something to love about the endlessly stunning night skies! Learn all about the different stories of love and romance written in the stars - from different cultures and societies all around the world. Whether you’re an expert or simply someone fascinated with the beauty of space, this show will be sure to enchant you. Join us for a night of storytelling and stargazing that will leave you lovestruck.
